name: Tellurium hexafluoride
desc: Tellurium hexafluoride is a chemical compound of tellurium and fluorine with the chemical formula TeF6. It is a colorless, highly toxic gas with an extremely unpleasant smell.

images.alt: Structure and dimensions of the molecule
